context-param.description: The starting language for the application.
IC Throw Runtime Exception on Error{true|false}
CTI Auto invoke CallInfo upon app start{true|false}
Runtime SSML Generation {true|false} - "true" enables SSML generation, "false" disables.
2.1 + IVVR, 2.1 Allows VXML 2.1 extensions, 2.0 Uses VXML 2.0 Only
(NATIVE|LOCAL_SRGS_SISR|LOCAL_SRGS_LITERALS, NATIVE means DTMF Grammars are in native asr format.
Grammar caching mode, none=no caching, default=system default or property setting
A path which contains all configuration files needed for appliction to run
Name of a file where all IVR application related configurations maintained
Name of a file where all dynamic menu related configurations maintained
Name of a file where all host interations related configurations are maintained
